name: Neon Dodge
description:
Welcome To Neon Dodge (Warning, Flashing Light). It's a brutally difficult game where your character will follow your mouse. You can Boost by Left Clicking and Dash short distances by Right Clicking. Both Consume boost (bottom bar). Boost regenerates over time.

You have 3 health, every 10 seconds without getting hit will bring you back up one health & it will also remove slows.

Can you keep the light alive until the end? (just over 4 min)

Good Luck!
